//
//
// This file contains the test vectors for a seven segment decoder.
// The first column in the enable signal.
// The next four columns are the inputs: d[4:0].
// The next 2 columns are the switch inputs.
// The next six columns are the segment data - gfedcba.
// The last four columns are the anode data.
// It needs to be 128 lines long to cover all possibilities.
//
1_0000_00_1000000_1110
1_0001_00_1111001_1110
1_0010_00_0100100_1110
1_0011_00_0110000_1110
1_0100_00_0011001_1110
1_0101_00_0010010_1110
1_0110_00_0000010_1110
1_0111_00_1111000_1110
1_1000_00_0000000_1110
1_1001_00_0010000_1110
1_1010_00_0100000_1110	// hexadecimal a
1_1011_00_0000011_1110	// hexadecimal b
1_1100_00_1000110_1110	// hexadecimal c
1_1101_00_0100001_1110	// hexadecimal d
1_1110_00_0000110_1110	// hexadecimal e
1_1111_00_0001110_1110	// hexadecimal f
0_0000_00_1111111_1110
0_0001_00_1111111_1110
0_0010_00_1111111_1110
0_0011_00_1111111_1110
0_0100_00_1111111_1110
0_0101_00_1111111_1110
0_0110_00_1111111_1110
0_0111_00_1111111_1110
0_1000_00_1111111_1110
0_1001_00_1111111_1110
0_1010_00_1111111_1110
0_1011_00_1111111_1110
0_1100_00_1111111_1110
0_1101_00_1111111_1110
0_1110_00_1111111_1110
0_1111_00_1111111_1110
1_0000_01_1000000_1101
1_0001_01_1111001_1101
1_0010_01_0100100_1101
1_0011_01_0110000_1101
1_0100_01_0011001_1101
1_0101_01_0010010_1101
1_0110_01_0000010_1101
1_0111_01_1111000_1101
1_1000_01_0000000_1101
1_1001_01_0010000_1101
1_1010_01_0100000_1101	// hexadecimal a
1_1011_01_0000011_1101	// hexadecimal b
1_1100_01_1000110_1101	// hexadecimal c
1_1101_01_0100001_1101	// hexadecimal d
1_1110_01_0000110_1101	// hexadecimal e
1_1111_01_0001110_1101	// hexadecimal f
0_0000_01_1111111_1101
0_0001_01_1111111_1101
0_0010_01_1111111_1101
0_0011_01_1111111_1101
0_0100_01_1111111_1101
0_0101_01_1111111_1101
0_0110_01_1111111_1101
0_0111_01_1111111_1101
0_1000_01_1111111_1101
0_1001_01_1111111_1101
0_1010_01_1111111_1101
0_1011_01_1111111_1101
0_1100_01_1111111_1101
0_1101_01_1111111_1101
0_1110_01_1111111_1101
0_1111_01_1111111_1101
1_0000_10_1000000_1011
1_0001_10_1111001_1011
1_0010_10_0100100_1011
1_0011_10_0110000_1011
1_0100_10_0011001_1011
1_0101_10_0010010_1011
1_0110_10_0000010_1011
1_0111_10_1111000_1011
1_1000_10_0000000_1011
1_1001_10_0010000_1011
1_1010_10_0100000_1011	// hexadecimal a
1_1011_10_0000011_1011	// hexadecimal b
1_1100_10_1000110_1011	// hexadecimal c
1_1101_10_0100001_1011	// hexadecimal d
1_1110_10_0000110_1011	// hexadecimal e
1_1111_10_0001110_1011	// hexadecimal f
0_0000_10_1111111_1011
0_0001_10_1111111_1011
0_0010_10_1111111_1011
0_0011_10_1111111_1011
0_0100_10_1111111_1011
0_0101_10_1111111_1011
0_0110_10_1111111_1011
0_0111_10_1111111_1011
0_1000_10_1111111_1011
0_1001_10_1111111_1011
0_1010_10_1111111_1011
0_1011_10_1111111_1011
0_1100_10_1111111_1011
0_1101_10_1111111_1011
0_1110_10_1111111_1011
0_1111_10_1111111_1011
1_0000_11_1000000_0111
1_0001_11_1111001_0111
1_0010_11_0100100_0111
1_0011_11_0110000_0111
1_0100_11_0011001_0111
1_0101_11_0010010_0111
1_0110_11_0000010_0111
1_0111_11_1111000_0111
1_1000_11_0000000_0111
1_1001_11_0010000_0111
1_1010_11_0100000_0111	// hexadecimal a
